4.1 Data Types and Files

All programs using FFTW should include its header file: 

#include <fftw3.h>

You must also link to the FFTW library. On Unix, this means adding -lfftw3 -lm at the end of the link command.

  • Complex numbers:
  • Precision:
  • Memory Allocation:
